name: Behavioral Health and Recovery Services (BHRS)
description: San Mateo County Behavioral Health and Recovery Services provides mental health and substance use treatment, prevention, and recovery services to residents of all ages in San Mateo County.
fullDescription: San Mateo County Behavioral Health and Recovery Services provides mental health and substance use treatment, prevention, and recovery services to residents of all ages in San Mateo County.
whatTheyOffer:
- Mental health assessment and treatment
- Substance use disorder treatment
- Crisis intervention services
- Youth and family services
- Older adult services
- Peer support programs
- Prevention and early intervention
- Housing support for clients
howToGetIt: Call the Access Call Center at 1-800-686-0101 for a free assessment and referral. Services available for Medi-Cal recipients at no cost; sliding scale available for others.
keywords: BHRS, San Mateo, mental health, substance abuse, addiction, drug treatment, alcohol, counseling, therapy, crisis, Medi-Cal, behavioral health
